input_text:
Job Title: Housekeeper

Location: Edina, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Ebenezer offers a robust compensation package for Housekeepers with excellent benefits and hourly wages starting from $15.95 - $22 / hour. Wage determinations will be based on related experience. 

This full-time Housekeeping /Cleaning position includes:

 70 hours per two weeks  Day Shift  Monday- Friday: 8:00AM-3:00PM  Benefits Available; https://www.ebenezercares.org/employee-benefits (paid personal time, matching retirement monies) 

There’s no place like Edina, MN and York Gardens Senior Living is proud to be part of this vibrant community. Our senior living is conveniently located near public transportation and the cross roads of Highways 100, I-35W and I-494. To many, Edina represents a lifestyle that’s synonymous with gracious living. We offer a combination of 76 assisted living, Independent Living, Memory care and Care Suites units. We boast an exceptional and tenured team of caregivers who believe in Ebenezer’s mission to heal, discover, and educate for longer healthier, more meaningful lives.

Ebenezer Senior Living is proud be voted 2022 Star Tribune Top Work Place, and has received this honor thirteen years in a row. We're an established organization with over 100 years of excellent service and an outstanding rate of growth. When you come to work at an Ebenezer community, we strive to support your growth, honor your strengths and empower you to make a difference in the lives of others!

Responsibilities/Job Description

 Performs thorough cleaning of all assigned areas, including vacuums carpets, sweeps and mops hard floor surfaces, dusts and/or damp wipes surfaces, sanitizes bathrooms, cleans all glass windows/mirrors.  Demonstrates precautionary work practices for the safety of others in the work areas, such as electric cords, wet floor signs, etc  Maintains housekeeping cart and storage area on daily basis and communicates supplies that need to be re-stocked  Performs job duties safely, using accurate body mechanics and protective equipment  Other duties as assigned 

Qualifications

Required:

 Ability to work independently, show attention to detail, multi-task and maintain confidentiality  Able to understand and follow verbal and written communication including policies/procedures and safety sheets 

Preferred:

 Work experience in cleaning or similar environment

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Housekeeper
output_json.summary: Ebenezer offers a robust compensation package for Housekeepers with excellent benefits and hourly wages starting from $15.95 - $22 / hour.

Performs job duties safely, using accurate body mechanics and protective equipment
